title: Windows 7 SP1 x86-x64 (Rus-Eng) 8in1 IE11+ KMS-activation v2 by
description:
Windows 7 SP1 IE11 + RUS-ENG x86-x64 -8in1- KMS-activation v2 (AIO)



[b]Software Version: 6.1.7601.17514 
Official website: microsoft
By assembling : m0nkrus 
Language: English / Russian 
Treatment: not required (the installer is already disinfected) 

System requirements: * 32-bit (x86) or 64-bit ( x64) 
processor with 1 GHz. * 1 GB of RAM. 
* Support for DirectX 9 interface with the driver WDDM, at least 128 MB of graphics memory, 
Pixel Shader 2.0 in color and 32 bits / pixel. 
* Hard disk capacity of 40 GB to 16 GB free disk space. 
* The drive for DVD-ROM drive. * Audio output capability. 
* Internet access. Description: Danae assembly is the successor of the build of Windows 7 SP1 IE11 + RUS-ENG x86-x64--8in1- KMS Activation (AIO) . 
It is distinguished from its predecessor is that the current assembly includes updates as of November 21, 2014 , it is completely redesigned activator, and, the rest, the little things ... 
The efficiency of the assembly as far as possible carefully checked. After installation you get a fully registered and activated Windows 7 operating system chosen wording

The assembly
So, this assembly includes 4 Russian edition and 4 English version of Windows 7 SP1 32-bit (x86) and 64-bit (x64) 
kernel : - Windows 7 Professional SP1 x86 Russian - 
Windows 7 Professional SP1 x86 English - 
Windows 7 Professional SP1 x64 Russian - 
Windows 7 Professional SP1 x64 English - 
Windows 7 Enterprise SP1 x86 Russian - 
Windows 7 Enterprise SP1 x86 English - 
Windows 7 Enterprise SP1 x64 Russian - 
Windows 7 Enterprise SP1 x64 English

Some features of the assembly

- The original installer of Windows 7 is replaced by slightly redesigned installer on Windows 8. 
- The assembly integrates all critical updates available as of November 21, 2014, including Internet Explorer 11. 
- Instead of the default embedded with updates Microsoft .NET Framework 4 Client Profile in the assembly of integrated lightweight version of .NET Framework 4.5.3 (project Slim .NET Framework 4.5.3 Preview x86 / x64 ). 
- In the assembly of integrated Microsoft Visual C ++ 2005, 2008, 2010, 2012 and 2013 Redistributable Package latest versions. To avoid duplicating install different applications earlier and refocus the program you want these packages on recent versions of libraries, installing older versions locked plugs (project [addon] Microsoft Visual C ++ Redistributable Package 2005-2008-2010-2012-2013 Hybrid ). 
- In It integrated package DirectX 9 . 
- At a very early stage of the installation has a pre-boot menu where you can select the bit depth of the primary shell, that is what will be used by the installer, x86 or x64. Because of this, you should not worry that the 64-bit version of the OS can not stand on RAID, and that users of 64-bit operating system may be without service recovery system. For the most inquisitive: Do not attempt to install the 32-bit version of the OS with the 64-bit installer - the final stage of deployment installer will give an error and refuse to continue with the installation. 
- In the System Restore service that runs from the installation media module is integrated Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (MSDaRT) 8.0.1 , and recovery service that is built into the system - MSDaRT 7.0 , which greatly expands the possibilities of resuscitation system. 
- For technical reasons, from the System Restore launched from the installation media is excluded item "System Restore" allows you to make roll back to previously established control points. 
- In the 32-bit version of System Restore, launched from the installation media, integrated program AntiSMS 6.5.3 to quickly auto-blocker treatment and Trojans. 
- With all editions unfenced, because of which at the stage of the installation could not enter the license key. 
- If during the installation you will enter a valid license key the selected version of Windows 7 in the corresponding field, the system will be activated by this key to lawfully.
- If during the installation you will enter certain keys (see. FAQ), the system will be installed without any kind has been activated. This may be necessary if the hands Now you do not have a valid license key, but soon you will have it. 
- If during the installation, you will not fit at all the key, the system will be activated automatically by the activator KMSAuto Net 1.3.3 of Ratiborus with the installation of automatic reactivation every 25 days. 
- If the system is activated automatically by a built-in assembly activator, in the start menu shortcut will be added to the executable file activator under the name "KMS-activation". With this activator can be activated not only Windows, but also Office 2010/2013 VL. 
- If you choose to install Windows 7 Enterprise (Enterprise), then after installation you will be able to switch the interface language from English to Russian and back standard means Windows 7 Enterprise (Enterprise). If you installed the editor Professional (Professional), you can use for this purpose utility Vistalizator , the label which is available in the "Start" menu. 
- For technical reasons, no system with this assembly can not be updated for Windows Vista / 7. However, if you must install from under the existing system, there is an opportunity to initiate a so-called Custom installation. When you run the installation from the already running 32-bit OS, it's simple. But to initiate the installation of a 64-bit OS, you need to start it than through setup.exe in the root distribution media, and through setup.exe, which is located in the Sources folder of the distribution. Autorun installation media when you run out of available operating systems, select the desired type of the start itself.

Differences from the build of Windows 7 SP1 IE11 + RUS-ENG x86-x64 -8in1- KMS-activation (AIO)
- The assembly integrates all critical updates available as of November 21, 2014 . 
- The assembly is integrated package of DirectX 9 . 
- Instead of Embedded me earlier package [Slim] .NET Framework 4.5.1 Full x86 / x64 , to build integrated Slim .NET Framework 4.5.3 Preview x86 / x64 . 
- Integrated me earlier in the assembly package [addon] Microsoft Visual C ++ Redistributable Package 2005-2008-2010-2012-2013 Hybrid ) is replaced by updated. 
- Integrated me earlier in the 32-bit version of Recovery Services system, launched from the installation media, the program AntiSMS 4.1 , replaced by AntiSMS 6.5.3 . 
- With all editions unfenced, because of which during the installation phase could not enter the license key. 
- Used by me earlier in the assembly activator KMScmd 3.02 Portable replaced a better activator KMSAuto Net 1.3.3 . 
- Unavailability of affordable preboot menu utility Windows Memory Diagnostic (Memtest) eliminated. 
- Other minor changes.
